title: Ep. 120: Looking at Pop Culture Through the Political Prism WIth Chuck Klosterman
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald discuss Who Won the Week (3:00) and Taboo (5:43) before they are joined by author and essayist Chuck Klosterman to talk about the state of pop culture and how assigning political meaning to it feels inescapable in the current climate (11:28).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
